---
title: "fix sequencing names"
output: html_notebook
---

Need to change seq18-21 to seq28-31

```{r}
source("../genomics/scripts/lab_helpers.R")

lab <- write_db("Laboratory")

seq <- lab %>%
  tbl("sequencing") %>% 
  collect()

change <- seq %>%
  filter(seq_id >= "SEQ18") %>% 
  mutate(id = 28:31) %>% 
  mutate(seq_id = paste0("SEQ", id)) %>% 
  select(-id)

seq <- change_rows(seq, change, "seq_id") %>% 
  filter(seq_id != "SEQ18", seq_id != "SEQ19", seq_id != "SEQ20", seq_id != "SEQ21")

# dbWriteTable(lab, "sequencing", seq, row.names = F, overwrite = T)

baits <- lab %>% 
  tbl("baits") %>% 
  collect()

change <- baits %>% 
  mutate(seq = ifelse(seq == "SEQ18", "SEQ28", seq),
    seq = ifelse(seq == "SEQ19", "SEQ29", seq), 
    seq = ifelse(seq == "SEQ20", "SEQ30", seq), 
    seq = ifelse(seq == "SEQ21", "SEQ31", seq))

baits <- change_rows(baits, change, "baits_id")
# dbWriteTable(lab, "baits", baits, row.names = F, overwrite = T)

```
